meanings.definition: A device or compartment used for freezing food or keeping it frozen.
meanings.sent1: I put the ice cream in the freezer to keep it cold.
meanings.sent2: The freezer in the kitchen is full of frozen vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The freezer was so full, it was like playing a game of frozen food Tetris.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a freezer, cold and unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The freezer hummed softly, preserving the food inside.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that freezes.
meanings.sent1: The freezer of winter turned the lake into solid ice.
meanings.sent2: The freezer of fear gripped her heart as she approached the dark alley.
meanings.sent3: The freezer in the horror movie had the power to freeze anything it touched.
meanings.sent4: His stare was like a freezer, chilling her to the bone.
meanings.sent5: The freezer of time seemed to stop as they shared that moment.
